subject: Re: [sugar] mounting a USB drive
body:
Im also trying to do this can someone please send me the instructions?  Thanks~ AnetoOn 3/29/07, Ashlesha Shintre <
ashlesha.shintre@gmail.com> wrote:Hi,I want to run a program, whose executable file is in a USB stick --
how do I mount it to the laptop in the terminal? I dont know the makeof the stick --On my personal machine, it is automatically mounted by Ubuntu --Thank you!Ashlesha._______________________________________________
